name: Ernest Davis
content: Ernest Davis Ernest Davis Department of Computer Science, Courant Institute of Mathematical Sciences, New York University Contact Email: . Address: Dept. of Computer Science, New York University, Room 329, 251 Mercer St., New York NY 10012 USA. But I am not often in my office, these days. Office hours (online): T 10-12, Th 2-3, or by appointment. Send me an email for a Zoom link. Teaching Current Course Web Pages: Artificial Intelligence, Monday and Wednesday 11:00-12:15, Online Fundamental Algorithms, Tuesday 5:00-7:00, GCASL room 269 Previous Course Web Pages Academic Family Tree (Teachers and Students) Notes on AI Topics Computer Science Education At NYU Publications Books Research Papers Surveys and Essays Reports on Informal Experiments Book Reviews Writing for a General Audience Videos Presentations Recreational Writing Vita A few useful links for automated commonsense reasoning: If you are interested in automated commonsense reasoning, you might like to look at the List of Benchmarks and Datasets for Commonsense Reasoning, my survey of these benchmarks, the Winograd Schema Challenge, and the CACM 2015 article surveying the state of the art by Gary Marcus and me.
